text: Hi Mahira!! Hope you’re feeling better, and no worries at all :)!  Glad the picture was clear, and feel free to ask anything if you have doubts on perspective...yes feel free to send your work when you want :) My week is going pretty well and chilled. I would enough busy but not crazy. We are almost done with the production of the show (I’m working on a tv serie for Nickelodeon as Environment Designer)...so now is a bit more relaxed as it’s almost over!
